head.title: Home | Nottingham Trent University

meta.name: description
meta.content: Official site for the Guardian University of the Year 2019, with information about award winning staff, satisfied students, world leading research, TEF Gold standard teaching, modern facilities and global opportunities.

meta.name: og:description
meta.content: Official site for the Guardian University of the Year 2019, with information about award winning staff, satisfied students, world leading research, TEF Gold standard teaching, modern facilities and global opportunities.

meta.name: twitter:description
meta.content: Official site for the Guardian University of the Year 2019, with information about award winning staff, satisfied students, world leading research, TEF Gold standard teaching, modern facilities and global opportunities.

div.p: This website uses cookies to enhance your user experience. By continuing to browse the site you are agreeing to our use of cookies. Find out more here

div.h2:
Get to know us at our open day on Saturday 30 November
Tour our campuses and accommodation; meet our staff and students; ask anything and everything you want to know.

div.style: no-repeat; background-size: cover; padding: 15px 18px 20px 18px; display: block; min-height: 230px;

div.h3: Open days
div.p: Our open days will give you a real feel for the NTU experience.Tour our campuses and accommodation; meet our staff and students; ask anything and everything you want to know.

div.h3: NTU rises to highest ever Guardian University Guide position
div.span: Find out more about our ranking

div.h3: Our prospectus will give you a taste of what student life is like at NTU
Confused about the UCAS application process?

div.span: Read our tips on how to apply

img.alt: Student at computer in the library

div.h3: Ten great reasons to study at NTU – one of the most popular universities in the UK!
Can’t wait to see what it’s like to study with us? Try our Virtual Tour today.
Interested in postgraduate study?
We’re proud to be a global university with students and staff from over 160 countries

International Scholarships
Prestigious awards for international and EU students
Looking to start with us in January?
NTU Fashion Design alumna Ladunni Lambo storms the runway at Lagos Fashion Week
Thinking about postgraduate research?
div.p: We offer opportunities to study for a Master of Philosophy (MPhil) or Doctor of Philosophy (PhD) in all of our academic schools, as well as other research degree qualifications.

div.span: Take the next step with NTU

img.alt: Person doing research in a lab

div.h3: “We chose to work with Nottingham Business School because of its wide range of expertise and its focus on applied research to meet the needs of organisations like ourselves”
Enabling Discovery, Driving Innovation, Changing the World
“We will continue to make additional investment against strategic research themes and research plans and grow our engagement with all funders of research”
All higher and degree apprenticeships are subject to approval from the employer-led Institute for Apprenticeships
div.p: Our apprenticeships are suitable for both small and large employers, and can be tailored to meet your specific business needs

div.span: Degree Apprenticeships: make them work for your organisation

img.alt: Student in food lab conducting tests

div.h3: We’re proud to work with small and medium-sized organisations to help them develop and grow

img.alt: Professor Amin Al-Habaibeh and student Dylan Knight

div.h3: We’ve got a reputation for producing skilled graduates who are full of ambition and energy
Current events
Latest news

div.span: Jools Holland honoured with inaugural “Confetti Award” at event celebrating 25 years of the Confetti Institute of Creative Technologies
Mums struggling to lose baby weight wanted for study
Nottingham Business School ranked in top 100 globally in the Financial Times 2019 Masters in Management rankings
Search for boy trebles to sing Walking in the Air

div.h3: Our reputation
div.p: We're nationally recognised for outstanding teaching, research, engagement with employers and student satisfaction. See all our awards

img.alt: University of the Year 2019 - The Guardian University Awards 2019
The Times Modern University of the year logo
